inclusion.criterion: Height of usual place of residence
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: less than 2,500 metres above sea level

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of serious blood system diseases

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: patient's behavior not mentioned as psychopathic

notes: Patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine. Genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%. Patient was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids for atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
